oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter written by William Henry Bendy, Co. M, 9th N.J. Inf. Regt., USA to his parents and sisters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Although this letter is not signed, it is assumed this letter is also written by Pvt. Bendy perhaps while he was at home on furlough. In the letter he requests his mother and father come to visit to console him after the death of his children.
